product_name: CHANELLE LIFT CREME YEUX Smooths - Firms
summary: SummaryAn eye cream that delivers a powerful combination of nature and efficacy for a smoother, firmer, more youthful and radiant appearance.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsBotanical alfalfa concentrate combines with a phyto-active complex infused with yeast extract and Indian chestnut extract.Together, they help smooth the look of wrinkles and fine lines and reduce the appearance of puffiness and dark circles.Item 2560173How To UseApply morning and evening to the entire eye area, including the upper eyelid.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isododecane, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Pentylene Glycol, Peg-8, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Squalane, Ipomoea Batatas Root Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Jojoba Esters, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Sodium Carbomer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chlorphenesin, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Caprylyl Glycol, Phospholipids, Sodium Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Escin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Beta-Sitosterol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Polyquaternium-51, Sodium Polyacrylate, Adenosine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrochloric Acid, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, IL40A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to the entire eye area, including the upper eyelid.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this, but
reviews.comments: I'm turning 60 this year and have always practiced a good skin care routine, so I decided to try Chanel. While I like the consistency and that it is fragrance free, plus rapidly absorbs, it didn't do anything, not for the price. In the store, it definitely looked like my dark circles were lighter, but truth be told, they're still just as dark and my eyes are still puffy. Not worth the price and I have yet to find one eye cream that works.

reviews.headline: Dries down crusty
reviews.comments: They must have changed the formula because I swear I used to love this. It's so drying now. I put it on and it feels ok but then it dries down to a crusty white in a couple hours. My makeup pills terribly on it. When I wake up there's white crust on my lashes. I'm so grossed out by this! I live in LA where it's hot and somewhat dry and this cream is making it worse. I couldn't even get halfway through the jar before wanting to throw it out and it's not cheap! I'm just using my face cream on my eyes until I find a replacement.

reviews.headline: I always have this product and I use it every day.
reviews.comments: I have used this product for many years. It is the best and I would never change eye creams after using this one.

reviews.headline: A very good eye cream for 45 plus
reviews.comments: I really believe this product works. It advertises for bags under the eyes. It really takes of them. 1st time I can honestly say I've seen it happen. Well woryh the investment for me

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: I love this product. I've used fir a year now. Worth the price

reviews.headline: Nice but not effective for the price
reviews.comments: I enjoy the consistency of the cream and that it is fragrance free. Le lift is a lighter cream but i feel that it sits on top of my skin.

reviews.headline: Best eye cream ever
reviews.comments: I have purchased almost every eye cream out there looking for THE ONE. I found it! Well worth the money. Think of it as an investment on you!!  Used the entire amount (loved it btw), went back to my less expensive one, huge mistake! Never again!!

reviews.headline: Fine line under eyes
reviews.comments: Everytime I go in Ulta, with those amazing lights, I could see the fine lines under my eyes.. and after putting this onâ€” no lines. Dreamy. Finally bought, and I use everday. Makes me look/feel better ðŸ˜‰

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I like how it makes my eyes feel,and I will keep using it again and again

reviews.headline: the very best
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this and OH MY GOD. it's worth every penny of its price tag. it was so luxurious, made my eyes feel like satin and look a decade younger

reviews.headline: I love this product. It has really helped my eyes
reviews.comments: I love both of the products I purchased. The eye cream is fantastic. The face cream is just what i was looking for due to my dry skin

reviews.headline: Very happy
reviews.comments: I love this product because it works great!

reviews.headline: Bummer
reviews.comments: I am a person with really tolerant skin, I have never had any bad reactions to anything I've ever tried except this. I have been trying a lot of new products lately for my deep under eye circles and puffiness. A salesperson recommended this product and at first I loved it, super smoothing but I think I'm having an allergic reaction because it definitely make's everything more puffy and I look really terrible when I use it. I usually love Chanel but this one just didn't work for me.

reviews.headline: This is amazing and really works
reviews.comments: I went into Ulta today looking for an eye cream to help hydrate and help eye bags.  I am turning 53 years old in a week. Salesperson for Chanel for 30 plus year had beautiful skin. She told me what she used. She put some Chanel Eye Cream on my the top of my hand. It absorbs quickly and I was amazed how hydrated, smooth my skin looked. This really works. The price is worth is. I will be back for ale Lift face serum, and cream. This stuff really works. A little goes a long way. Thank you Joanne

reviews.headline: Best eye cream!
reviews.comments: Best eye cream I've tried and I've tried all kinds including ones with retinol. Moisturizing and great for fine lines!

reviews.headline: Yes I would but again
reviews.comments:
Gio was the best.  Love this product! Keeps my eye
Skin soft and supple

reviews.headline: Love chanel but NOT this product
reviews.comments: Though it goes on smoothly, it gets gritty leaving what feels like residue around your eyes.

reviews.headline: Rich eye cream that fully moisturizes
reviews.comments: Thick cream with humectants to draw in moisture & emollients to lock it in; soaks in rapidly, and is not sticky or greasy.  Has alfalfa that supposedly adds proteins/vitamins.  It is somewhat overpriced, but hey, it's Chanel.

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and can't use any eye creams i can get allergic reaction or burn. This is game changer and just bought a second bottle.

reviews.headline: I would but again for sure
reviews.comments: I love it, perfect for my eyes, spreading reducing my eye lines
